system.purpose: Manages Finances, Trade, and the making of Profits.
system.effect: Once per Session, can take up to 300 Achievement Points earned to the completion of one Endeavour and apply them to another.

description.value:
Purpose: Manages Finances, Trade, and the making of Profits.

Effect: Once per Session, can take up to 300 Achievement Points earned to the completion of one Endeavour and apply them to another.
